label: ABC3_mP20_14_e_e_3e-001
title: HgMnO$_{3}$ HP1 Structure
comments:
This is a high-pressure structure, formed at 18GPa and 1473K.  At 20GPa it transforms into the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_hR10_167_b_e_a-001}{PrNiO$_{3}$ perovskite structure}. 
 The current sample was found to have a N\'{e}el temperature of 32K, and the structural parameters were determined under ambient conditions. 
 The ICSD puts this under the high-pressure \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_mP20_14_3e_2e-001}{Pb$_{2}$O$_{3}$ structure} prototype, but the bonding of the metallic atoms to the oxygens is different in the two cases.
